Matrix Analysis¶

pytraj.matrix.mwcovar(traj=None, command='', top=None, dtype='ndarray', mat_type='full', *args, **kwd)¶
Parameters:

traj : Trajectory-like

command : cpptraj command

top : Topology, optional, default None

mat_type : str, {‘full’, ‘half’, ‘cpptraj’}, default ‘full’

if ‘full’: 2D full matrix if ‘half’: triangular matrix if ‘cpptraj’: 1D array

*args, **kwd: more arguments
